Struct none

boost::intrusive::none

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/intrusive/options.hpp>


struct none {
  // member classes/structs/unions
  template<typename Base> 
  struct pack {
  };
};

Description

This type indicates that no option is being used and that the default options should be used
